name: Halifax Views
description:
This week we will take the Dartmouth Cove route in reverse. That means we'll head down Ochterloney and Alderney in order to make our way to the trail. We will take the trail all the way to the NSCC Ivany campus and then make our way back home via Pleasant St.
As always, we meet at the Sullivans Pond Gazebo at 6:30pm.
